title.rendered: Tips for coaches and playing sport

content.rendered:
Tips for playing sport…

For coaches or referees:

  • use visual aids, signals & physical demonstrations
  • ensure player has understood instructions – explain adjustments to team mates
  • use lights, flags or arm raise to start a race
  • allow player to tap referee to gain attention


For player or player’s family:

  • effective positioning e.g. in front of coach
  • teach coach & teammates sport specific signs
  • ask for instructions to be repeated if not heard


Download the Real Life Tip infographic.


More information:

  • Tips for coaches
  • Sport modifications
